doc.description:
Image Class
 *
 *
This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.

tags.todo: Add a static function and var to check for available libraries (Imagick/GD)

name: bbn\File\Image

jpg2pdf.name: jpg2pdf
jpg2pdf.summary: Converts one or more jpg image(s) to a pdf file. If the pdf file doesn't exist will be created.

arguments.name: jpg
arguments.description: The path of the pdf file

pdf2jpg.name: pdf2jpg
pdf2jpg.summary: Converts pdf file to jpg image(s).

arguments.name: pdf
arguments.description: The destination filename. If empty is used the same path of pdf. Default: empty.

arguments.name: jpg
arguments.description: The index page of pdf file to convert. If set 'all' all pages to convert. Default: 0(first page).

svg2png.name: svg2png

__construct.name: __construct

parent.name: __construct

__toString.name: __toString

getExtension.name: getExtension
getExtension.summary: Returns the extension of the image. If the file has jpg extension will return 'jpeg'.

parent.name: getExtension
parent.summary: Return the extension of the file.

test.name: test
test.summary: Tests if the object is a image.

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

display.name: display

save.name: save
save.summary: Save the image in a new destination if given or overwrite the file (default).

parent.name: save
parent.summary: That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.

getWidth.name: getWidth
getWidth.summary: If the file is an image will return its width in pixel.

getHeight.name: getHeight
getHeight.summary: If the file is an image will return its height in pixel.

resize.name: resize
resize.summary: Resize the width and the height of the image. If is given only width or height the other dimension will be set on auto.

arguments.name: h
arguments.description: If cropping the image. Default = false.

arguments.name: crop
arguments.description: w The maximum value for new width.

arguments.name: max_w
arguments.description: h The maximum valure for new height.

autoresize.name: autoresize
autoresize.summary: Resize the image with constant values, if the width is not given it will be set to auto.

crop.name: crop
crop.summary: Returns a crop of the image.

rotate.name: rotate

flip.name: flip

quality.name: quality
quality.summary: Compresses and sets the image's quality (JPEG image only).

brightness.name: brightness

contrast.name: contrast

grayscale.name: grayscale
grayscale.summary: Converts the image's color to grayscale.

negate.name: negate
negate.summary: Converts the image's color to negative.

polaroid.name: polaroid
polaroid.summary: Converts the image's color with polaroid filter.

thumbs.name: thumbs

toString.name: toString

iterateLines.name: iterateLines

parent.name: iterateLines

download.name: download
download.summary: Downloads the file. At the end of the script the user will be invited to choose the file's destination. If the file doesn't exist return an object with parameter file = null.

parent.name: download
parent.summary: Downloads the file. At the end of the script the user will be invited to choose the file's destination. If the file doesn't exist return an object with parameter file = null.

getHash.name: getHash
getHash.summary: Return the hash of the file.

parent.name: getHash
parent.summary: Return the hash of the file.

delete.name: delete

parent.name: delete

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

description:
*
 *
This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.

description_parts.content: This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.
